description: Stablo is an open-source, minimal blog website template built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS & Sanity CMS. This is the free version of the premium Stablo blog template made by Web3Templates. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, the free version of Stablo is empowered by Sanity CMS and allows you to set up a fully functional personal/startup blog with just one click.

subtitle: imple landing page built with 11ty and Tailwind CSS.
description: This streamlined landing page, crafted using 11ty (Eleventy) and Tailwind CSS, exemplifies modern, efficient web development. With 11ty, a static site generator known for its flexibility and performance, content is served swiftly, providing users with a seamless browsing experience. Tailwind CSS complements this by enabling highly customizable, responsive design, ensuring the page looks polished across all devices. This combination of technologies produces a clean, minimalist aesthetic while maintaining excellent performance metrics, making the landing page both visually appealing and technically robust.
features: PostCSS for processing Tailwind CSS and integrated to styled-jsx

subtitle: Elegant & Responsive Design: NINE4 Template 3 for Modern Web Solutions.
description: This template is the third in the NINE4 series by Jack Latimer. It is a beautifully crafted dark-themed landing page that can be used for any SaaS or business. It is built on top of Next.js, bootstrapped with create-next-app, and styled with TailwindCSS.
features: PostCSS for processing Tailwind CSS and integrated to styled-jsx

subtitle: Elegant & Responsive Design: NINE4 Template 2 for Modern Web Solutions.
description: This free template is a beautifully crafted landing page for a SaaS, mobile app, or business. It is built with Next.js, bootstrapped with create-next-app, and styled with Tailwind CSS. To learn more check out its Github page. The template is made by Jack Latimer, a Front-End React Developer based in Liverpool, England.
features: PostCSS for processing Tailwind CSS and integrated to styled-jsx

subtitle: Free and open-source admin dashboard interface built on top of Tailwind CSS and Flowbite
description: Windster is a free and open-source Tailwind CSS admin dashboard template with a responsive sidebar layout, authentication pages, charts, users, and various product pages. It includes hundreds of Tailwind CSS components from the Flowbite component library, such as buttons, dropdowns, navbars, modals, and date pickers.

subtitle: Tailwind CSS Starter Template - Admin Dashboard Template
description: Admin Dashboard Template is a well-designed dashboard for any application, SaaS, or project. The template is open-source, built with Tailwind CSS, and created by Tailwind Toolbox. It has multiple well-designed and fully responsive UI elements and components. The template is just an HTML file using a full CDN hosted Tailwind CSS file.
features: PostCSS for processing Tailwind CSS and integrated to styled-jsx

subtitle: Tailwind CSS Starter Template - Landing Page
description: Landing Page is an open-source, generic landing page template for Tailwind CSS created by Tailwind Toolbox. The template is just an HTML file using a full CDN hosted Tailwind CSS file. It is suitable for any physical or digital product, startup, or business.
features: PostCSS for processing Tailwind CSS and integrated to styled-jsx

subtitle: Elegant & Responsive Design: NINE4 Template 1 for Modern Web Solutions.
description: This is a free-to-use template for websites made with Next.js, bootstrapped with create-next-app, and styled with Tailwind CSS. It is great for any agency or business site. The template was made by Jack Latimer, a Front-End React Developer based in Liverpool, England.
features: PostCSS for processing Tailwind CSS and integrated to styled-jsx

subtitle: Elegant & Responsive Design: NINE4 Template 4 for Modern Web Solutions.
description: This free template is a beautifully crafted landing page for a SaaS, mobile app, or business. It is built with Next.js, bootstrapped with create-next-app, and styled with Tailwind CSS. To learn more check out its Github page. The template is made by Jack Latimer, a Front-End React Developer based in Liverpool, England.
features: PostCSS for processing Tailwind CSS and integrated to styled-jsx

subtitle: Tailwind CSS Starter Template - App Landing Page
description: App Landing Page is an open-source, generic App Landing Page template for Tailwind CSS created by Tailwind Toolbox. This app landing page is a simple yet stylish template to showcase your next mobile application, product, or startup.
features: PostCSS for processing Tailwind CSS and integrated to styled-jsx

subtitle: Ready-to-use Tailwind CSS blocks.
description: This project provides multiple blocks built using Tailwind CSS that you can use in your own projects. This project is not a dependency that you add to your project but instead provides you with HTML that you can easily copy and paste into your own project.

subtitle: Landing website + Blog using Jekyll & Tailwind CSS
description: Cookie is a fast and easy to deploy landing website for your next project. Cookie is a Jekyll and Tailwind CSS based static website that makes the whole process of creating and launching landing websites extremely easy. With its responsive and mobile friendly pages, integrated blog, additional pages and [Soopr](https://www.soopr.co) integration, you can focus on building your product than landing website.
features: Additional pages like about us, terms of service & privacy policy
Integrated blog, write content in markdown format
Easy to customize using Tailwind CSS
Easy to deploy, one-click deploy on Netlify possible
Soopr integrated - easy to customize share & like buttons, URL shortning and website analytics
Auto generated share images for social media using Soopr

subtitle: 🧩 The component library for fast and accessible development of gorgeous interfaces.
description: Windmill React UI is a modern, open-source component library designed for building sleek and responsive web applications with React. It offers a collection of reusable, customizable components and templates, enabling developers to quickly create consistent and visually appealing user interfaces. Built with Tailwind CSS, Windmill React UI provides flexibility and ease of customization, allowing seamless integration with existing design systems and workflows. Its focus on accessibility ensures that applications built with Windmill are inclusive and user-friendly.
features: You get dark theme using one prop
It's accessible out-of-the-box (and built listening to a real screen reader)
Easier to learn through live code examples

subtitle: Tailwind Stamps is free and open-source component library for TailwindCSS
description: Tailwind Stamps is a free and open-source collection of reusable UI components that can be used in a variety of web applications. It provides simple, stylish, and customizable elements for the most common application UI use cases. The library includes components such as headers, alerts, navbars, cards, and much more. All of the components are built with HTML and the default utility classes provided by Tailwind CSS. Additionally, the interactive components are built with Alpine.js so the components are truly copy-paste.

subtitle: America's favorite Eleventy blog template.
description: 11r is a modern and elegant blog template designed with a sleek dark color scheme, ideal for developers and content creators. Built using the powerful static site generator Eleventy (11ty), it leverages Rollup for efficient bundling, ensuring optimized performance. The template integrates Tailwind CSS for rapid and customizable styling, while Prism adds robust syntax highlighting for showcasing code snippets seamlessly. With its streamlined setup and developer-friendly tools, 11r offers a perfect foundation for crafting visually appealing and high-performing blogs.
features: Eleventy for static site generation. See .eleventy.js.
TailwindCSS for utility-first styling. See tailwind.config.js and src/styles/tailwind.css.
markdown-it-anchor for generating anchors for headings.
eleventy-plugin-nesting-toc for generating tables of contents from anchors. See this page for a demo.
Prism syntax highlighting for code with copy button scripting included via clipboard.js. See src/styles/base.css for the theme; and src/scripts/copy.js, which is used by main.js.
Rollup for bundling and compiling. See rollup.config.js.
JavaScript-based privacy policy notice dismissal handling. See src/scripts/privacy-policy.js, which is used by main.js.
Deploy script for GitHub Pages via deploy.sh, using the gh-pages branch. Be sure to edit said script to work with your repository. Remember to also configure the repository appropriately.
SEO mostly done for you. Ensure you replace the data referenced in src/globals/site.json, including the images in public/.

subtitle: Starter Template for Netlify CMS, Eleventy, Alpine JS & Tailwind CSS
description: This Starter Template combines the power of Netlify CMS, Eleventy, Alpine.js, and Tailwind CSS to provide a robust foundation for modern web development. Designed for flexibility and performance, the template enables seamless content management with Netlify CMS, efficient static site generation with Eleventy, and dynamic interactivity using Alpine.js. Tailwind CSS ensures rapid, responsive design implementation with utility-first styling. Whether you're building a blog, portfolio, or small business website, this starter template streamlines development workflows, allowing you to focus on creating exceptional user experiences with minimal setup and maximum scalability.

subtitle: Vue UI components with configurable classes ready for TailwindCSS
description: Vue Tailwind is a set of Vue components created to be customized to adapt to your application's unique design. The Vue Tailwind components are meant to be customized with custom CSS classes that you can define when you install the library. Plus, most component settings are configurable, so using this library is like having your personal set of components for your particular needs.
features: Define your components look and feel by defining custom default CSS classes.
Add unlimited variants for every specific use case.
Override the default value of the props according to your needs.
Create different versions of one component with different default settings.

subtitle: Eureka is a feature-rich and highly customizable Hugo theme.
description: Eureka is a versatile and feature-rich Hugo theme designed to meet the needs of modern website creators. With its extensive customization options, it empowers users to craft unique and visually stunning websites tailored to their specific requirements. Offering a sleek and responsive design, Eureka ensures optimal performance across all devices, while its rich set of features simplifies content management and enhances user experience. Whether you're building a personal blog, a portfolio, or a professional website, Eureka provides the flexibility and functionality to bring your vision to life with ease.

subtitle: Perfect UI Components and Templates. Made with TailwindCSS. Open Source. Fully Responsive and Accessible.
description: Myna UI is a Tailwind CSS library of well-crafted UI Components and Templates. The components are fully responsive and accessible. Best of all, the components are free and open-source. Make sure to follow the creator of the components on Twitter for any updates - @praveenjuge
features: TailwindCSS UI Components and Templates made without any Plugin.

subtitle: Beautifully designed Tailwind CSS UI blocks.
description: Flowrift is a library of beautifully designed UI blocks built with Tailwind CSS and HTML. The components are built using Tailwind's default utility classes so no extra configuration is needed. With Flowrift, you can quickly create full-page layouts, or copy small code snippets to add to your own designs. The components are fully customizable and all have nice and modern designs.

subtitle: Free Tailwind CSS components for application UI, ecommerce and marketing with support for dark mode, RTL and Alpine JS 🚀
description: HyperUI is a collection of free Tailwind CSS components that can be used in your next project. With a range of components, you can build your next marketing website, admin dashboard, eCommerce store and much more.
features: Browse the website for a component you like.
Preview the component at different breakpoints and check its compatibility with
Click on the 'Copy' button to copy the source code.
Paste the copied code into your project.

subtitle: The most popular, free and open-source Tailwind CSS component library
description: Daisy UI adds beautiful component classes to Tailwind which are fully customizable and themeable. Daisy UI builds a design system that is scalable and designer-friendly. It adds component classes like btn, card, and more to Tailwind CSS.

subtitle: Free landing page template built using nuxt and tailwindcss
description: Nefa is a free crypto web app landing page template built on top of NuxtJS and Tailwind CSS. The template boasts a sleek and modern design that can be used for your next crypto / web3 project.

subtitle: Dashboard starter template built with Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS.
description: Our Dashboard Starter Template is built with Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS, providing a modern, scalable, and highly customizable foundation for web applications. Designed for efficiency and ease of use, this template leverages Vue 3’s reactive framework and Tailwind CSS’s utility-first approach to ensure a seamless development experience. It includes essential UI components, responsive design, and best practices for performance optimization.

subtitle: Tail-kit is a free and open source components and templates kit fully coded with Tailwind css 3.0.
description: Tail-kit is a Free and Open Source Tailwind UI kit. It does not change or add any CSS and only uses the utility classes already packaged with TailwindCSS 2.0. It features multiple HTML elements that can be used in all web projects.

subtitle: Mamba UI is a free and open-sourced UI kit with 150+ Tailwind CSS components and templates.
description: Mamba UI is an open-source collection of over 100 Tailwind CSS components and templates that can help you create almost any type of website with just a couple of clicks. It is a toolkit for developers and designers that makes creating interfaces a breeze. The UI kit has a variety of well-designed components to help you get started. Everything is modular and customizable to fit your brand. From blogs to portfolios to online stores, you can quickly create a variety of layouts that look great on any screen.
features: Choose your primary color from any of the 17 different Tailwind colors
Available in HTML, React and Vue
All the icons and illustrations are open-sourced as well
Easy to customize with Tailwind CSS

subtitle: Kutty is a tailwind plugin for building web applications.
description: Kutty is a tailwind plugin for building web applications. It has a set of accessible and reusable components that are commonly used in web applications. The components are built using HTML and AlpineJS for reactivity.

subtitle: A simple starter project to create a blog using Eleventy and Tailwind CSS
description: This project serves as a straightforward starting point for building a blog using Eleventy (11ty) and Tailwind CSS. Eleventy is a flexible static site generator that enables fast and efficient content creation, while Tailwind CSS provides a utility-first approach to styling, ensuring a modern and responsive design. The project is structured for ease of use, making it ideal for developers looking to quickly set up a blog with minimal configuration.
